input.description: File adapter to use to create the input xml document file for vm creation.
ITSM Change Id corresponding to srm id
ITSM Task Id corresponding to change id.
The fully qualified folder path under which the vm template parameter file shall be created.
BladeLogic's folder ID where the vm creation job will be created.
Job name to be added to configuration file.

Details received from SRM request.
Example:
<vm> <vmpackage_id>11111</vmpackage_id> <virtual_center>myvirtualcenter</virtual_center> <destination type="host">myvmhost</destination> <data_store>some_datastore</data_store> <port_group>some_portgroup</port_group> <ipconfig> <prop name="ipaddress" value="192.168.1.100"/> <prop name="subnet_mask" value="255.255.255.0"/> <prop name="default_gateway" value="192.168.1.1"/> <prop name="primary_dns" value="10.1.1.100"/> <prop name="secondary_dns" value="10.1.1.101"/> </ipconfig> <hostname>myvm</hostname> <no_of_processors>2</no_of_processors> <memory_in_MB>256</memory_in_MB> <disk_info> <disk> <storage_path>BLProv:Storage1</storage_path> <disk_size>1</disk_size> <use_existing_disk>true</use_existing_disk> </disk> <disk> <storage_path>BLProv:Storage2</storage_path> <disk_size>5</disk_size> <use_existing_disk>true</use_existing_disk> </disk> </disk_info> <vm_property> <prop name="expiration_date" value="05/26/2009"/> <prop name="owner" value="win admin"/> </vm_property> <system_package_id>1110</system_package_id> <system_package_dbkey>1110</system_package_dbkey> <server_property> <prop name="servername" value="myserver"/> </server_property> <syspackage_local_property> <prop name="datastore" value="thestore"/> </syspackage_local_property> <acl_template_id>2222</acl_template_id> <batch_job_dbkey> 4444 </batch_job_dbkey> </vm>

output.description: String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.

<VirtualGuestPackage> <VGPackageID> <xsl:value-of select="//vmpackage_id/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </VGPackageID> <VGName> <xsl:value-of select="//hostname/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </VGName> <xsl:if test="string-length(//no_of_processors/text())>0"> <VGNoOfProcessors> <xsl:value-of select="//no_of_processors/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </VGNoOfProcessors> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(//memory_in_MB/text())>0"> <VGMemoryInMB> <xsl:value-of select="//memory_in_MB/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </VGMemoryInMB> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="count(//disk_info)>0 and string-length(//disk_info)>0"> <VGDiskInfo> <xsl:for-each select="//disk_info/disk"> <Disk> <StoragePath> <xsl:value-of select="storage_path/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </StoragePath> <DiskSize> <xsl:value-of select="disk_size/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </DiskSize> <UseExistingdisk> <xsl:value-of select="use_existing_disk/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </UseExistingdisk> </Disk> </xsl:for-each> </VGDiskInfo> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="count(//port_group)>0 and string-length(//port_group)>0"> <VGNetworkInfo> <xsl:for-each select="//port_group[string-length(.)>0]"> <Network> <NetworkPortGroup> <xsl:value-of select="text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </NetworkPortGroup> <NetworkAdaptorType> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Flexible</xsl:text> </NetworkAdaptorType> <ConnectAtPowerOn> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </ConnectAtPowerOn> </Network> </xsl:for-each> </VGNetworkInfo> </xsl:if> </VirtualGuestPackage> <VirtualGuestJob> <JobName>${job name}</JobName> <JobFolderID>${job folder}</JobFolderID> <VirtualGuestDestination> <xsl:value-of select="//destination/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </VirtualGuestDestination> <ExecuteNow> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">true</xsl:text> </ExecuteNow> </VirtualGuestJob> <LifeCycle> <ServiceRquestID>$[srm id]</ServiceRquestID> <ChangeID>$[change id]</ChangeID> <TaskID>$[task id]</TaskID> <Owner> <xsl:value-of select="//vm_property/prop[@name="owner"]/@value" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </Owner> <ExpiryDate> <xsl:value-of select="//vm_property/prop[@name="expiration_date"]/@value" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </ExpiryDate> </LifeCycle> <CustomConfig> <vgComputerName> <xsl:value-of select="//hostname/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </vgComputerName> </CustomConfig> <xsl:if test="string-length(//ipconfig/prop[@name="ipaddress"]/@value) > 0"> <GuestNetworkAdapter> <xsl:if test="string-length(//ipconfig/prop[@name="ipaddress"]/@value) > 0"> <ipAdress> <xsl:value-of select="//ipconfig/prop[@name="ipaddress"]/@value" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </ipAdress> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(//ipconfig/prop[@name="subnet_mask"]/@value) > 0"> <subnetMask> <xsl:value-of select="//ipconfig/prop[@name="subnet_mask"]/@value" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </subnetMask> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(//ipconfig/prop[@name="default_gateway"]/@value) > 0"> <defaultGateway> <xsl:value-of select="//ipconfig/prop[@name="default_gateway"]/@value" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </defaultGateway> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(//ipconfig/prop[@name="primary_dns"]/@value) > 0"> <priDnsServer> <xsl:value-of select="//ipconfig/prop[@name="primary_dns"]/@value" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </priDnsServer> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(//ipconfig/prop[@name="secondary_dns"]/@value) > 0"> <secDnsServer> <xsl:value-of select="//ipconfig/prop[@name="secondary_dns"]/@value" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </secDnsServer> </xsl:if> </GuestNetworkAdapter> </xsl:if> </CreateVGRequest> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
